summary: lmao I’m looking through my pics and vids and this is his face when he said that some of the letters he and Axel get are Very...
body:
lmao I’m looking through my pics and vids and this is his face when he said that some of the letters he and Axel get are Very Emotional and when they read them they just go *dead*

also for anyone who’s worried, this is what the evening looked like, talking a drink in hand, taking pics, hugging. Unless I completely missed something when I was talking to the rest of the cast, I didn’t see anything inapropriate towards Maxence

summary: I noticed how Lucas is quite forward with his worries and suspicions in general. Wondering how Eliott might react to it when...
question: I noticed how Lucas is quite forward with his worries and suspicions in general. Wondering how Eliott might react to it when Lucas seems overbearing to him once he knows about his MI. Because I could totally see that with the ways that Lucas is different from Isak. Plus Eliott obviously has a problem with feeling likes he‘s being controlled. I feel like because he feels so free atm with Lucas he probably wouldn’t have told him about his MI yet, even if Lucas had never said what he said about MI.
answer: I see what you mean, but I don’t think it will play out like that. To me, Lucas seems like the kind of person who will let you be whoever you are as long as he trusts you. That trust is not fully there right now, because of the Lucille thing and Eliott’s decision to break things off a few weeks ago. But I think once everything is cleared, he will be the most supportive and gentle boyfriend that Eliott could wish for, and not overbearing at all.

reblog.comment: I see what you mean, but I don’t think it will play out like that. To me, Lucas seems like the kind of person who will let you be whoever you are as long as he trusts you. That trust is not fully there right now, because of the Lucille thing and Eliott’s decision to break things off a few weeks ago. But I think once everything is cleared, he will be the most supportive and gentle boyfriend that Eliott could wish for, and not overbearing at all.

That trust is not fully there right now, because of the Lucille thing and Eliott’s decision to break things off a few weeks ago. But I think once everything is cleared, he will be the most supportive and gentle boyfriend that Eliott could wish for, and not overbearing at all.

summary: Am I the only one in this fandom who would rather pretend the actors don't exist? I mean no disrespect by that, because I...
body: Am I the only one in this fandom who would rather pretend the actors don’t exist? I mean no disrespect by that, because I respect Maxence & Axel so much, and I am grateful for their time and talent. I also think they deserve praise, which contradicts what I’m feeling. I guess, I wish people would remember that actors are NOT their charcaters, and they don’t OWE you anything. Please just treat people well, and respect their time and space.
